New Records: This was the lowest total defended in a T20 by South Africa against Bangladesh, and it was also the lowest target Bangladesh failed to chase in a T20 match.
Key Match Events: The match was another low-scoring thriller, with South Africa defending the lowest total in their head-to-head against Bangladesh.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Heinrich Klaasen said he was 'nervous and tired' during the final over, but praised the team's performance. Bangladesh captain Najmul said his side'should have won' and credited the opposition's bowling.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was another thrilling game in the T20 World Cup 2024, with the Proteas securing a crucial victory to move closer to qualification for the Super Eights.
